std::text_encoding encoding() const;
}}

Returns a {{ltt std|cpp/locale/text_encoding}} object that represents the implementation-defined encoding scheme associated with the locale {{c|*this}}.

===Return value===
A {{ltt std|cpp/locale/text_encoding}} object that represents the associated encoding scheme.
